choices.text: ChatGPT is an AI-powered chatbot that uses natural language processing (NLP) to generate conversations. It is powered by OpenAI's GPT-3 language model, which enables it to understand and respond to user input in a natural, conversational manner. ChatGPT can be used to automate customer service, provide personalized recommendations, and more. It is an easy-to-use, cost-effective solution for businesses looking to improve their customer experience.
